title: Peachpit - HTML and CSS Video QuickStart

Genre: E-learning



The video companion to the bestselling HTML & CSS: Visual QuickStart Guide, Eighth Edition, is based on material by Elizabeth Castro and Bruce Hyslop and presented by Kris Hadlock. These short, tasked-based videos provide the necessary groundwork to understanding the fundamentals of HTML described in the book.

The videos look at HTMLÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s commonly used structural elements for developing a website and step you through creating a basic Web page with the absolute essentials. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll look at elements, attributes, and CSS style sheets; learn how to add a web form to your page to style form elements; add a web form to your page to style form elements; debug and test code; and more. This video will have you up and running with HTML in no time.
